testcase.name: should throw exception when signing with null amount
should start execution from PAID state
should transition from DRAFT to IN_NEGOTIATION
should complete deal from IN_PROGRESS state

testcase.name: should cancel deal from any active state
should throw exception when signing with null manager
should sign deal from IN_NEGOTIATION with valid parameters

should mark as paid from SIGNED state
should throw exception when completing with end date before start date
